text: It's 2:03 AM. Perfect time for a midnight snack!
Can you tell me a poem and then make all the words that are rhyme in bold?

Sure! Here's a little poem for you:

In the **night**, the stars are **bright**,  
Guiding dreams with their soft **light**.  
Whispers of the gentle **breeze**,  
Dancing through the swaying **trees**.  

How's that for some poetic flair?
That's nice. Can you give me the link for Google.com?
Sure, here you go: [Google.com](https://www.google.com) Enjoy your searching!
